text: @marcorubio Oh for the love of ur fake sky daddy PLEASE STFU little Marco. The coronavirus is based on SCIENCE.  tRump put a wanna be pastor in charge who thinks he can pray the gay away. We know a lot more then ur saying. But don't worry, he drew around the border w sharpie so we're safe.🙄

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
